page.title: 19Wildlife (cont)
page.content: Red squirrel These tree-dwelling rodents are very common in the woods around Tannadice. Their colouring and fast movements make them difficult to seein the trees. Hedgehog A very common inhabitant of the woods and hedgerows. Eats slugs, snails and insects and is generally a friend to the farmer. Weasel Probably the most efficient predator hereabouts. Will kill and devour animals many times its own weight. Makes its home in natural rock crevices or drystane dykes. Roe Deer These attractive but shy animals abound in the area. They inhabit the woodlands and will eat almost any type of vegetation.
